summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of AWS Route 53 Resolver management operations—including endpoints, DNS resolver rules, rule associations, and tag handling—by using the Moto library to mock AWS services and covering creation, retrieval, update, deletion, filtering, and error scenarios.
business_intent: Ensure that the application's Route 53 Resolver integration works correctly and robustly, providing reliable DNS resolution management and proper handling of edge cases before deployment to production.
